faq.title: Pricing Questions
faq.q1: What's included in the printed price?
faq.a1: The printed price includes professional printing on premium paper, hardcover binding, and shipping to your door.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal through our secure payment processor.
faq.a4: Taxes are calculated at checkout based on your location. Shipping costs vary by country and are shown before you complete your purchase.
faq.a5: Printed books are professionally bound with premium paper. Specific format options (size, binding type) are available during the book creation process.
